code: import{ORDER_CREATE_REQUEST,ORDER_CREATE_SUCCESS,ORDER_CREATE_FAIL,ORDER_CREATE_RESET,ORDER_DETAILS_REQUEST,ORDER_DETAILS_SUCCESS,ORDER_DETAILS_FAIL,ORDER_PAY_REQUEST,ORDER_PAY_SUCCESS,ORDER_PAY_FAIL,ORDER_PAY_RESET}from"../constants/orderConstants.js";export var orderCreateReducer=function orderCreateReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ORDER_CREATE_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ORDER_CREATE_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,success:true,order:action.payload};case ORDER_CREATE_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case ORDER_CREATE_RESET:return{};default:return state;}};export var orderDetailsReducer=function orderDetailsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{loading:true};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ORDER_DETAILS_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ORDER_DETAILS_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,order:action.payload};case ORDER_DETAILS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var orderPayReducer=function orderPayReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ORDER_PAY_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ORDER_PAY_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,success:true};case ORDER_PAY_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case ORDER_PAY_RESET:return{};default:return state;}};
